message.body: Hey I'm just getting done work... I'm going to Adobe (on ########) Friday night with a couple of friends if you and some buddies want to come out
Ok.. how many friends should I bring?
It'll probably just be me, my roommate, and one of our co-workers.. but you can bring as many you want
Just curious, how old are you? Lol
Ok. It sounded like a bunch of people were going.. sounds like fun.. I'm there..
I'm sorry, I didn't even see your question till now.. I'm 34, how about you?

Lol that's fine.. I never would have guessed that tho lol. You don't look it but I was just wondering in case you had younger buddies. Younger meaning since Adobe cards. But I can see that won't be a problem tho haha
Thx, I have friends 23 and up.. yeah people say I look mid 20s a lot.. how old are u?
Yea that's what I was thinking, lol.. I'm 25
Ok, cool. I like how your always in a cheerful mood.. I need your secrets. .lol
Ahaha when you work at my day job, you'll also be excited to be anywhere else but there
Lol..that's funny.. I thought your day job was sweet, that bad huh?? Well before you know it you'll be your own boss.. I gotta try a piece of cake...lol
Oh no, my day job is like a Nazi camp. Its ridiculous but it pays good bec of the OT.
Good morning #####. .lol.. yeah, I definitely feel asleep mid text.. have fun at concentration camp today.. lol
